args.value: Stan model caching reduces compilation time
Data processing is optimized for large datasets
Memory usage is controlled during simulations
Parallel processing improves performance for independent calculations
Not enough cores for parallel testing
Database queries are optimized with indexing

SELECT patient_id, category, AVG(value) as avg_value
      FROM measurements 
      WHERE category IN ('A', 'B')
      GROUP BY patient_id, category
      ORDER BY patient_id
Plot rendering is optimized for large datasets
File I/O operations are buffered efficiently
